thread.section_title: Thrift Books Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Thrift Books | www.thriftbooks.com
thread.title: Steve

author: Steve
title: Steve
text: First time I ordered books on line and was a little bit apprehensive about doing so. I took a chance and ordered six books that I have been looking for quite some time. The order was confirmed and within two days received a e-mail and a tracking number. To make a long story short, 4 of the six books arrived within a week and the other two arrived two weeks after bad weather. Upon examining the packages I was very impressed at the quality the packing of the books and was very pleased with the condition of each book . Needless to say I was one happy camper . I will definitely will be ordering in the future and will tell others about my positive experience
